short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to create pseudorandom passwords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small Chrome extension that generates a pseudorandom password for convenience. You can select whether to include uppercase characters, the length (between 6 and 30 inclusive, defaults to 12) and symbols of !#@%_+

A handy "copy to clipboard" function is also included so saving you the bother of the CTRL+C.

Created by Lui Crowie
Other work available at crowzfx.co.uk
